title: Palo Alto Medical Foundation
description: Palo Alto Medical Foundation is a network of Sutter-affiliated physicians providing health care services to patients in Alameda, Contra Costa, San Mateo, Santa Clara and Santa Cruz counties.
cleaned_text: Find the Right Care for You Video Visits See your doctor or a clinician virtually, right from home. Walk-In Care Convenient care for common illnesses and health needs. Urgent Care For care that's needed now, but isn't an emergency. Treatments and Services What type of care do you need? Our staff is ready to help. Flu Resources Get facts about the flu and schedule a flu shot appointment. Symptom Checkers Our interactive symptom checkers can help you find care.
